title: Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, Customizable, Spinning Action Figure and Playset, Kids Toys for Boys and Girls 6 and up
descriptions:
Introducing the Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, a thrilling and customizable playset for boys and girls aged 6 and up!

This deluxe arena is designed with a variety of exciting features to enhance your Bakugan battles. It's fully customizable, allowing you to create a unique battleground that suits your play style. The built-in phone holder keeps your device secure and accessible for added convenience during gameplay.

The set includes a Special Attack Dragonoid, an exclusive action figure with a spinning feature that brings dynamic action to your battles. It also comes with a multi-part ball linking system, enabling you to connect and customize your Bakugan figures in new ways.

The playset includes a variety of accessories to enhance your battles, such as 2 Clan Flags, 3 Sparring Totems, a Character Card, a Special Attack Card, 2 Gate Cards, an XL Rip Cord, and a Bakugan Token. The XL Rip Cord adds an extra element of excitement to your battles, allowing your figures to spin with increased durability and speed.

The Bakugan Battle Arena is upgradeable with training sets (sold separately), offering endless possibilities for expanding your collection and enhancing your battle strategies. This product is an official Bakugan product, backed by the Spin Master Care Commitment for quality and durability.

As a bonus, this set includes a special code for the online game on Roblox, allowing you to continue the battle in the digital world. The Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid is not just a toy, but a collectible set that offers hours of fun and excitement. Experience the thrill of the Bakugan world today!
